          <title>
            <string language="en">Light propagation in a clad fibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Ausbreitung in einer plattierten Faser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation légère dans une fibre plaquée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propagação clara em uma fibra clad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Propagazione chiara in una fibra placcata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά διάδοση σε μια ντυμένη ίνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Propagación ligera en una fibra revestida</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a light guide with cladding. Light propagates inside the fibre core with minimal losses.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">cladding</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light refraction</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">optic fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical losses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">outer glass layer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">total internal reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine helle Anleitung mit 
Umhüllung. Licht pflanzt innerhalb des Faserkernes mit 
minimalen Verlusten fort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un guide léger avec le
revêtement. La lumière propage à l'intérieur du noyau de 
fibre avec des pertes minimales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma guia clara com 
cladding. A luz propaga dentro do núcleo da fibra com perdas 
mínimas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una guida chiara con 
rivestimento. La luce si propaga all'interno del nucleo della 
fibra con le perdite minime.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ελαφρύ οδηγό με την 
επένδυση. Το φως διαδίδει μέσα στον πυρήνα ινών με τις 
ελάχιστες απώλειες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una guía ligera con 
revestimiento. La luz propaga dentro de la base de la fibra con 
pérdidas mínimas.</string>
          </description>
